snippet: GOTTLIEB--Robert W. We mourn the passing of our friend and attorney. Bob's ability and intellect will be missed by all who had the good fortune to know him. His rigor and incisive analysis with which he handled our business affairs was matched by the genuine warmth and compassion with which he graced our lives. We extend our sincere condolences to his wife Alice and children. Joy and Walter Samuels 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOTTLIEB--Robert W. We mourn the passing of our friend and attorney. Bob's ability and intellect will be missed by all who had the good fortune to know him. His rigor and incisive analysis with which he handled our business affairs was matched by the genuine warmth and compassion with which he graced our lives. We extend our sincere condolences to his wife Alice and children. Joy and Walter Samuels 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOTTLIEB, ROBERT W
